metadata.title: USN-3310-1 -- lintian vulnerability
metadata.description: Jakub Wilk discovered that lintian incorrectly handled deserializing certain YAML files. If a user or automated system were tricked into running lintian on a specially crafted package, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3310-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  lintian - 2.5.43ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
